key.name: source-language
key.description: The language to translate text from.

key.name: target-language
key.description: The language to translate text into.

key.name: debug-mode
key.description: When enabled, the extension will print verbose logs to the journal.

key.name: translation-enabled
key.description: Toggle to enable or disable automatic translation.

key.name: toggle-shortcut
key.description: Keyboard shortcut to toggle translation on and off. Example: <Alt>w

key.name: translate-shortcut
key.description: Keyboard shortcut to translate the currently selected (PRIMARY) text immediately. Example: <Alt>t

key.name: use-clipboard-fallback
key.description: If the PRIMARY selection is empty or unavailable, also try the CLIPBOARD buffer.

key.name: api-service
key.description: The service to use for translation (bing, google, ai).

key.name: ai-model
key.description: The model name to use for AI translation.

key.name: ai-api-url
key.description: The API URL for AI translation service.

key.name: ai-api-key
key.description: The API Key for AI translation service.
